example_sentence_english: I am looking for a quiet studio.
I am going to the studio.

example_sentence_italian: Ho letto una recensione sullo studio.
example_sentence_english: I read a review about the studio.

notes: no common contraction with 'lo'; often left as 'con lo'
example_sentence_italian: Collaboro con lo studio da anni.
example_sentence_english: I have been collaborating with the studio for years.
